Greetings to Libyan Head of State
articles.content:
Greetings to Libyan Head of State 
    Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Moammer el Gaddafi, leader of the Great September First Revolution of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, on Mar. 1 on the occasion of the 27th anniversary of the proclamation of Jamahiriya in Libya.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger, the message wished him greater success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to Tunisian Party
articles.content:
Congratulations to Tunisian Party 
    Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea today sent a congratulatory message to the Central Committee of the Constitutional Democratic Rally of Tunisia on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the rally.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the WPK and the CDRT would continue to develop in the future in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, the message wished the rally great success in its work to achieve national unity and develop the national economy.
